src:
Starship Entertainment makes announcement warning legal action
04 Nov 2019, 03:37 by jennywill



Starship Entertainment will be taking legal action.
MONSTA X's current situation involving Wonho and Shownu has unfortunately brought an incredible amount of hate comments. There has also been a doctored photo of Shownu floating around.
Starship Entertainment has warned of legal action for both malicious comments and the distribution of Shownu's photo. You can read their full statement below:



Hopefully this will help stave off some of the hate comments.
